title: English for Business and Entrepreneurship
headline: Learn English communication skills for business and entrepreneurship with this free online program course.
description: This free online English for Business and Entrepreneurship language course is designed to teach non-native English speakers about doing business and entrepreneurship through English. You will learn about entrepreneurship, identifying business opportunities, conducting market research, creating business plans, and a range of other important skills through readings and video lectures to help you achieve your English language and business goals.
courseDescription:
This free online course on English for Business and Entrepreneurship will enable you to learn the English language skills necessary to succeed in the international workplace. You will study business English through authentic readings and video lectures, while learning about business vocabulary and concepts. This online course begins by introducing you to the concept of entrepreneurship by examining business ideas, products, and opportunities. You will also learn about the basics of market research, including how to identify an opportunity as an entrepreneur.

Next, you will focus on business plans, why they are important, and you will practice creating your own business plan. In the final part of this free online course, you will be presented with the basics for funding a business, the various means of sourcing funds as an entrepreneur such as debt-financing, equity-financing, and crowdfunding. You will learn how to create a persuasive presentation, or pitch, based on your business plan and the art of creating an effective hook to be used in making a great pitch.

This English for Business and Entrepreneurship free online course is designed for non-native English speakers who are interested in learning more about the global business economy. It will also be of interest to learners who are seeking ways to develop communication skills, effective business plans and source funds for business ideas in the world of entrepreneurship. So why wait? Start this course today and improve your knowledge and skills of English for Business and entrepreneurship.
